FUNCTION_TITLE

theme_scalop.Rd

FUNCTION_DESCRIPTION

Usage

theme_cna(
  title.size = 16,
  text.size = 14,
  axis.title.size = title.size,
  legend.title.size = title.size,
  strip.text.size = title.size,
  axis.text.size = text.size,
  legend.text.size = text.size,
  legend.position = "bottom",
  legend.justification = "right",
  text.colour = "black",
  ...
)

Arguments

title.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 16

text.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 14

axis.title.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: title.size

legend.title.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: title.size

strip.text.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: title.size

axis.text.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: text.size

legend.text.size

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: text.size

legend.position

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 'bottom'

legend.justification

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 'right'

text.colour

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 'black'

...

PARAM_DESCRIPTION

Value

OUTPUT_DESCRIPTION
